scripts.build: TARGET_CC=/usr/local/opt/llvm/bin/clang-11 TARGET_AR=/usr/local/opt/llvm/bin/llvm-ar rimraf dist pkg && TARGET_CC=/usr/local/opt/llvm/bin/clang-11 TARGET_AR=/usr/local/opt/llvm/bin/llvm-ar webpack
scripts.start: TARGET_CC=/usr/local/opt/llvm/bin/clang-11 TARGET_AR=/usr/local/opt/llvm/bin/llvm-ar rimraf dist pkg && TARGET_CC=/usr/local/opt/llvm/bin/clang-11 TARGET_AR=/usr/local/opt/llvm/bin/llvm-ar  webpack-dev-server --open -d
